name: Beast/Monster Leg
description: A leg harvested from a beast or monster creature with enhanced physical capabilities. Both legs must be from the same creature to gain matching pair benefits.
properties: Standard: No benefit. Champion: No benefit unless you have a matching pair. If you have a matching pair of Champion legs, choose +1 Movement speed OR +1 Fitness. Elite: No benefit unless you have a matching pair. If you have a matching pair of Elite legs, gain +1 Movement speed AND +1 Fitness.

name: Clockwork Leg
description: A mechanical prosthetic leg crafted from brass, steel, and clockwork mechanisms. Powered by a quartz crystal core, it functions as a fully operational replacement limb. Unlike biological implants, it requires no rejection checks and can be repaired with engineering.
properties: Fully functional leg replacement. No pain, health, or resolve penalties. No rejection checks required. Can be repaired using engineering.
